title: 2nd Chance Housing 10 Minutes from UNT with Pool!!
posting_body: ['2B, 937 sqft, $1835', '3B, 1035 sqft, $1795', 'Second Chance Criteria: Evictions accepted after 3 years, and broken leases accepted after 2 years.', 'Property debts are allowed, but if you have more than one, it will have to be discussed with the leasing office.', 'Misdemeanors and felonies accepted on a case-by-case basis.', 'Income must be at least 3 times monthly rent.', 'Community Amenities:', '24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', 'Barbecue Grills', 'Business Center', 'Picnic Tables', 'Playground', 'Volleyball Court', 'Apartment Amenities:', 'Washer/Dryer Rentals Available', 'Large Closets', 'Cable/Satellite Connections', 'Ceiling Fans', 'Dishwasher', 'Refrigerator', 'Pet Restrictions: A maximum of 2 pets per household, breed restrictions may apply.', 'Contact us for more info!', 'Kalisha Norman, REALTOR ®', 'Novus Real Estate/Big State Locators', 'Text/call', 'show contact info', '<URL>']
